panels.description: Current "Transaction Per Second" based on total_xact_count

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_xact_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_xact_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: TPS - $databases

panels.description: Current "Queries Per Second" based on total_query_count

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: QPS - $databases

panels.description: Current value based on derivative of total_query_time /  total_query_count

targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_query_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_query_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Avg. query runtime - $databases

panels.description: Current avg. wait time to get a connection, per query

targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_wait_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_wait_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Pool wait time - $databases

panels.description: Current Incoming traffic  based on total_received.

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_received')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_received')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Incoming traffic - $databases

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_sent')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_sent')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval), 
  database,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_xact_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_xact_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, data->>'database' as database
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
database,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag)) as "Pool wait time"

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_wait_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_wait_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, data->>'database' as database
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  database,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, data->>'database' as database
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  database,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "Incoming rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_received')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_received')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, data->>'database' as database
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
database,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag)) as "Avg. runtime"
from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_query_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_query_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time,
          data->>'database' as database
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  database,
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "Outgoing rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_sent')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_sent')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag, data->>'database' as database
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where data->>'database' in ($databases) and dbname = '$monitoredsource' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by data->>'database', time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1

list.definition: select dbname as monitoredsource from admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics where metric = 'pgbouncer_stats';
list.label: Monitored Source
list.name: monitoredsource
list.query: select dbname as monitoredsource from admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics where metric = 'pgbouncer_stats';

list.definition: select distinct (data->>'database') as database from pgbouncer_stats where dbname = '$monitoredsource' ;
list.label: DB Name
list.name: databases
list.query: select distinct (data->>'database') as database from pgbouncer_stats where dbname = '$monitoredsource' ;
